characters.story: "TWOH!" the mouth commands sharply, drooling with saliva - to spit spittle!
"Yin?" the mouth and clock question curiously - will you recite and chant poetry?
"TAN!" the shells sing cheerfully - being greedy, to covet and desire!
"Chin?" the jewels question curiously - is it a stringed instrument, a zither for music?
"LEE!" the old west tree commands sharply - the chestnut nut and kernel!
"Tan?" the water and sunflower question curiously in the old west - is this a deep pool, a frigid cave for rabbits?
"CHYEN!" the road sings cheerfully - time to resituate, relocate to Taiwan!
"FOO!" he commands sharply - to overturn, topple and reverse!
